resources.string: eatART is an art lab. We make audacious and improbable large-scale kinetic, robotic, and mechanized sculptures that investigate our human relationship to energy use. To learn more visit eatART.org or MondoSpider.com
Who am I?\nI didn't decide what to write...
Ben has a passion for capturing images (both in photos and in videos), connecting with people and create futuristic projects. www.thecooperbros.ca
Communication design is her passion and profession. Her vision is to make the word prettier through expedient design. www.designlabel.de
Matthias is a html native. Currently is node.js in his focus besides android and a bunch of ajax ingredients. twitter.com/nivoc
Omri is a computer hacker, android programmer, and technology buff who loves a good project. Looking for an invite the the US! http://thebaumers.com
Prithiraj has interests in project planning, db designing and team coordination. He is currently focused on learning google technologies. www.whyo2.com
